Title: Uomini sull'orlo di una crisi di nervi
Actors: Pino Ammendola, Vincenzo Crocitti, Gianni Garofalo
Plot: Vincenzo, Gianni, Nicola, and Pino are four friends who for years have been meeting every Monday to play poker. But this time Nicola is in crisis with his wife. The evening is ruined, but Pino has an idea. Why not invite a "ringer"?
